Package game.gameactors.enemies.graveyard

Class PileOfBones

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.gameactors.enemies.graveyard.PileOfBones
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, DeathRuneDroppper, Resettable
public class PileOfBones
extends Actor
implements Resettable, DeathRuneDroppper
A class that represents a pile of bones on a game map that can revive back into a Skeleton after a certain number of turns alive.
See Also:
Actor, Resettable, DeathRuneDroppper

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Overrides the playTurn method of @see Actor to make the PileOfBones revive back into a @see Skeleton after a certain number of turns or do nothing otherwise.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - a list of available actions for the PileOfBones.
      lastAction - the last Action performed.
      map - the GameMap containing the PileOfBones.
      display - the Display that will display the map.
      Returns:
      a new instance of @see Action
